name: Hunted (halcyon99)
description:
"Hunted is a 3D twin stick shooter taking place in the wild. Users will play as a stag escaping from a horde of wolves, navigating through a small space and evading the ever-increasing number of enemies with only the gun strapped to its antlers."

Navigate with WASD or left joystick. Turn and shoot with arrow keys or right joystick.

*Note: You may need to increase your screen brightness.
